Test.Name: Fault on first request

STEP 1 - Get Network Default Gateway Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 46 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetNetworkDefaultGateway() in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 762 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
